gov.ca.water.calgui.tech_service.impl

Class ErrorHandlingSvcImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ca.water.calgui.tech_service.impl.ErrorHandlingSvcImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IErrorHandlingSvc

    public class ErrorHandlingSvcImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IErrorHandlingSvc
    This is the class for handling different type of error like validation business, system and also used for displaying the error messages.
    Author:
    Mohan

                                    java.lang.Throwable aThrowable)
        Description copied from interface: IErrorHandlingSvc
        This method is used to display the Validation related Errors. For example when user forget to enter the value in a field then we use this method to display the error.
        Specified by:
        validationeErrorHandler in interface IErrorHandlingSvc
        Parameters:
        mainFrame - For displaying the message.
        aThrowable - An exception class which has all messages in layer and the stack trace.

      • getMessageAndStackTraceFromLayeredError

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMessageAndStackTraceFromLayeredError(java.lang.Throwable aThrowable)
        This method will change the layered exceptions into the message string and also have the stack trace as a string.
        Parameters:
        aThrowable - An exception class which has all messages in layer and the stack trace.
        Returns:
        In the list the 1st value will be the error message and the 2nd value will be the stack trace of the Exception.
